pageProduct.name: Scholl Shock Reducer Daily Insole
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Shock Reducer Everyday Insole is designed to provide all day shock absorption and pressure relief for everyday use

WHY USE SCHOLL SHOCK REDUCER EVERYDAY INSOLES?

• 3000+ shock absorbing gel nodules for pressure relief and shock              absorption
• Gel nodules for added cushioning
• Breathable gel design
• Anti-slip technology to prevent wrinkling in shoes

Boxed Contents: One pair insoles.

Size: 1 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• All day shock absorption and pressure relief
• Gel nodules for added cushioning

Warnings

Discontinue use if discomfort or irritation occurs. If irritation persists, seek medical advice. Do not use in contact with broken or irritated skin.

Directions

Step 1 Simply cut to your size using the printed cutter guideline.
Step 2 Insert into your shoes with cloth side up.

It is recommended to replace the insoles every 6 months or sooner if showing signs of wear.

USAGE ADVICE

Fits shoe size: 3-12 (UK), 3-12 (AUS M), 5-13 (AUS F)

EU
A: 36 B: 37 C: 38 D: 39 E: - F: - G: 7 H: 42 I: 43 J: 44 K: 45 L: 46 Full Length: 47
